org.ensembl.variation.driver
Interface PopulationGenotypeAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, java.rmi.Remote
public interface PopulationGenotypeAdaptor
extends Adaptor

This adaptor provides database connectivity for PopulationGenotype objects.

Author:
Craig Melsopp

                     throws AdaptorException
